object.name: GiveawayWinners
object.description: This object represents a message about the completion of a giveaway with public winners.
object.html_description: This object represents a message about the completion of a giveaway with public winners.
object.rst_description: This object represents a message about the completion of a giveaway with public winners.

annotations.description: The chat that created the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: The chat that created the giveaway
annotations.name: chat

annotations.description: Identifier of the message with the giveaway in the chat
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the message with the giveaway in the chat
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the message with the giveaway in the chat
annotations.name: giveaway_message_id

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway were selected
annotations.html_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway were selected
annotations.rst_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when winners of the giveaway were selected
annotations.name: winners_selection_date

annotations.description: Total number of winners in the giveaway
annotations.html_description: Total number of winners in the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: Total number of winners in the giveaway
annotations.name: winner_count

annotations.description: List of up to 100 winners of the giveaway
annotations.html_description: List of up to 100 winners of the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: List of up to 100 winners of the giveaway
annotations.name: winners

annotations.description: The number of other chats the user had to join in order to be eligible for the giveaway
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of other chats the user had to join in order to be eligible for the giveaway
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of other chats the user had to join in order to be eligible for the giveaway
annotations.name: additional_chat_count

annotations.description: The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of months the Telegram Premium subscription won from the giveaway will be active for
annotations.name: premium_subscription_month_count

annotations.description: True, if only users who had joined the chats after the giveaway started were eligible to win
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if only users who had joined the chats after the giveaway started were eligible to win
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if only users who had joined the chats after the giveaway started were eligible to win
annotations.name: only_new_members

annotations.description: True, if the giveaway was canceled because the payment for it was refunded
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the giveaway was canceled because the payment for it was refunded
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the giveaway was canceled because the payment for it was refunded
annotations.name: was_refunded
